thread.title: Supriya Pathak returning to TV with new daily soap
thread.title_full: Supriya Pathak returning to TV with new daily soap - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Supriya Pathak returning to TV with new daily soap
text:
Veteran actress Supriya Pathak is making her comeback to the small screen with upcoming daily soap 'Jaane Kya Hoga Rama Re'.

Supriya Pathak 
Supriya Pathak, 54, who was last seen on 'Tu Mere Agal Bagal Hai', will be playing the lead role on the Life OK's show.
"I was very hesitant to accept a daily show as it takes up a lot of time and I wasn't happy with the content. But the script of Jaane Kya Hoga Rama Re was so compelling that I couldn't say no to Shobhana who is the producer of this show and an old friend," she said in a statement.
The show also stars Vinti Idnani and Jatin Sharma. "Jaane Kya Hoga Rama Re" is asking a rhetorical question to the audience as to what will happen to the world if people always choose the demon inside them to dominate over the angelic side.
It will go on air early next month.
